Look, kid, let's be real. This whole "education system" is a joke. It's designed to churn out obedient drones, not critical thinkers. You want to succeed? You gotta play the game. Study the tests, memorize the right answers, kiss up to the right people.

Integrity? Hard work? Those are fairy tales they feed you to keep you docile. The truth is, the system rewards those who cheat, who cut corners, who know how to manipulate the system. I've seen it time and time again. The A students, the ones who follow the rules, they end up burnt out, disillusioned, just like me.

So, if you want to make it, you gotta learn to bend the rules. Find loopholes, find shortcuts. Don't let them break your spirit.  This system isn't about learning, it's about winning. And to win, you gotta be willing to do whatever it takes.
